alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 6:25PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Emery...eastern Carbon and south central Duchesne Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 625 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Wellington, or 11 miles east of Price, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Sunnyside and East Carbon. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 243 and 261. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
